
Simple when block
.
((when dragons))
*content*
((/when))
.
<p v-if="dragons">
<p><em>content</em></p>
</p>
.

When block with multiple paragraphs
.
((when dragons))
*content*

another **paragraph**
((/when))
.
<p v-if="dragons">
<p><em>content</em></p>
<p>another <strong>paragraph</strong></p>
</p>
.
